It’s time to extend the expanded #CTC. #SOTU

Tiia & I send our condolences to Paul’s wife, Didi, & their three children.

1496499316449493004.text: Sad to hear about Dr. Paul Farmer’s sudden passing. 1494348191109636100.text: Administrator Dickson has led FAA through a difficult three years, & I have appreciated working with him to implement bipartisan aircraft certification reform & address serious concerns about 5G deployment near the nation’s airports.

1489636270087229451.text: ICYMI 🧵⬇️ Yesterday, I secured three amendments in the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, an important bill to boost U.S. global competitiveness while investing in U.S. manufacturing, jobs & economic growth ⬇️ https://t.co/djjIjdUOTS

1489634797442027523.text: Great news for jobs in our state! Washington shellfish farmers will soon be able to export to Europe again. 🦪⬇️ https://t.co/nwsXuCZdnL

1489398748241346561.text:
My #AmericaCOMPETES amendments closely align w/what I believe the U.S. must do to better compete w/China & the world. Read my updated China White Paper, which is clear-eyed about the challenges China poses to U.S. global leadership.

https://t.co/4ylER3RsOx

1489398747146686466.text:
Since 1946, Fulbright exchanges have been a vital tool for deepening U.S. understanding of China.
 
My amendment w/@RepDonBeyer restores exchanges w/China to build U.S. expertise on China & enable Chinese participants to experience the real U.S. & benefits of academic freedom.

1489398746177802242.text:
China’s #BRI invests in digital infrastructure projects around the world that often lack high standards of privacy & data security.
 
My amendment helps the U.S. compete by prioritizing U.S. support for high standard projects like expansion of wireless networks in The Gambia.

1489398745158594572.text:
The U.S. has fallen behind as a leader in refugee resettlement.
 
As Congress takes steps to protect Uyghur refugees, my amendment ensures admission of Uyghurs does not inadvertently take away opportunities from other vulnerable refugee groups from other parts of the world.

1489398744147759104.text:
In addition, three of my amendments to the bill were just adopted that ⬇️

✅ Restore U.S. leadership on human rights
✅ Invest in high-quality digital infrastructure
✅ Strengthen Fulbright exchanges & people-to-people ties

For more on my amendments, keep scrolling ⬇️

1489398741782118406.text: Today, the House is considering amendments to the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, a bill that boosts U.S. competitiveness abroad while investing in manufacturing, jobs & economic growth in WA & across the U.S. The bill reflects many priorities I identified in my White Paper last year.
